text: Narcissus longispathus is a species of bulbous plant that is endemic to Spain.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families Its natural habitat is rivers. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==Bibliography== * Hernández-Bermejo, E., Prados, J., Benavente, A., Díaz, A., Herrera-Molina, F., Garrido, A. & Luque, P. 2006. Narcissus longispathus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Narcissus longispathus
